tool_description: The Affordable SMS API, send 100 SMS for only $1. Receive 100 free credits on signup.
name: SMSjet
title: SMSjet

api_list.name: Validate Phone Number
api_list.description: Check the validity of a phone number's format.

required_parameters.name: phone_number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to validate. Must include country code.

api_list.name: Check SMS Send Status
api_list.description: Check the send status of an SMS using its ID

api_list.name: Check Status of All Sent SMS
api_list.description: Check the send status of all SMS sent.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smsjet.p.rapidapi.com/api/checksms/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsjet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smsjet.p.rapidapi.com/api/checksms/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsjet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
